Fresh and vibrant salads with generous portions. The chicken gyro salad was outstanding.
Great healthy options. The falafel was crispy but could use more seasoning.

Good quality and fresh fish, though service was a bit slow on a busy night.
Lovely outdoor seating with great views. The burger was tasty, but the fries were soggy.
Fantastic ambiance and friendly staff. The fish tacos were flavorful and fresh.
